markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Morphic Manipulation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3775) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 79</row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

You've attuned your natural aura to that of plant life, coaxing it to grow faster than normal. You sit for 10 minutes with a small, natural non-creature plant—such as a lone flower, a small bush, or a potted succulent—while you bring your aura in tune through meditation. You coax the plant to advance one stage in its life cycle: from seed to sprout, sprout to plant, plant to flower, or flower to fruit. If the plant doesn't have proper nutrients (if you're sprouting a seed without soil or water, for example), the plant withers 5 minutes after you complete the activity. Performing this activity more than once per day renders you [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) and unable to use Morphic Manipulation until your next full night's rest.
name: Morphic Manipulation

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 7" pfs="Standard" > Morphic Manipulation Source Dark Archive pg. 79 Prerequisites Master in Nature --- You've attuned your natural aura to that of plant life, coaxing it to grow faster than normal. You sit for 10 minutes with a small, natural non-creature plant—such as a lone flower, a small bush, or a potted succulent—while you bring your aura in tune through meditation. You coax the plant to advance one stage in its life cycle: from seed to sprout, sprout to plant, plant to flower, or flower to fruit. If the plant doesn't have proper nutrients (if you're sprouting a seed without soil or water, for example), the plant withers 5 minutes after you complete the activity. Performing this activity more than once per day renders you fatigued and unable to use Morphic Manipulation until your next full night's rest.
